verses.verse: Blessed <WH835> is the man<WH376> that walketh<WH1980> not in the counsel<WH6098> of the wicked<WH7563>, Nor standeth<WH5975> in the way<WH1870> of sinners<WH2400>, Nor sitteth<WH3427> in the seat<WH4186> of scoffers<WH3887>:
But his delight<WH2656> is in the law<WH8451> of Jehovah<WH3068>; And on his law<WH8451> doth he meditate<WH1897> day<WH3119> and night<WH3915>.

And he shall be like a tree<WH6086> planted<WH8362> by the streams<WH6388> of water<WH4325>, That bringeth forth<WH5414> its fruit<WH6529> in its season<WH6256>, Whose leaf<WH5929> also doth not wither<WH5034>; And whatsoever he doeth<WH6213> shall prosper<WH6743>.
The wicked<WH7563> are not so<WH4671>, But are like the chaff which the wind<WH7307> driveth away<WH5086>.
Therefore the wicked<WH7563> shall not stand<WH6965> in the judgment<WH4941>, Nor sinners<WH2400> in the congregation<WH5712> of the righteous<WH6662>.
For Jehovah<WH3068> knoweth<WH3045> the way<WH1870> of the righteous<WH6662>; But the way<WH1870> of the wicked<WH7563> shall perish<WH6>.
